org.opentcs.components.kernel

Interface RechargePositionSupplier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Lifecycle
    Deprecated. 
    Implementation-specific interface does not belong into generic API. Moved to implementation.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public interface RechargePositionSupplier
extends Lifecycle
    A strategy for finding locations suitable for recharging vehicles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<DriveOrder.Destination> findRechargeSequence(Vehicle vehicle)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a sequence of destinations for recharging the given vehicle.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.opentcs.components.Lifecycle

        initialize, isInitialized, terminate

    • Method Detail

      • findRechargeSequence

        @Nonnull
java.util.List<DriveOrder.Destination> findRechargeSequence(@Nonnull
                                                                     Vehicle vehicle)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a sequence of destinations for recharging the given vehicle. In most cases, the sequence will probably consist of only one destination. Some vehicles may require to visit more than one destination for recharging, though, e.g. to drop off a battery pack at one location and get a fresh one at another location.
        Parameters:
        vehicle - The vehicle to be recharged.
        Returns:
        A sequence of destinations including operations for recharging the given vehicle. If no suitable sequence was found, the returned sequence will be empty.
